block.p: If the chairman is named Penske and the president is named Penske, why not call the whole company Penske?

That's what United Auto Group, a network of car dealerships, is asking its shareholders to do at the company's annual meeting next month. Roger S. Penske has been the company's chairman and chief executive for eight years and in January, his son, Roger S. Penske Jr., was promoted to president. The elder Penske is a well-known race car driver and race team owner.
If the chairman is named Penske and the president is named Penske, why not call the whole company Penske?

That's what United Auto Group, a network of car dealerships, is asking its shareholders to do at the company's annual meeting next month. Roger S. Penske has been the company's chairman and chief executive for eight years and in January, his son, Roger S. Penske Jr., was promoted to president. The elder Penske is a well-known race car driver and race team owner.
If shareholders agreed to change the name to Penske Automotive Group, the company would license the name from Mr. Penske's other company. Its name is the Penske Corporation.
